description:
Ryusui and Senku take to the skies in a science versus science dogfight while Xeno`s forces mount a ground counterattack.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Ceux qui connaissent les règles et ceux qui les font
Quien conoce y quien hace las reglas
Rule o Shiru Mono Tsukuru Mono
Those Who Know the Rules; Those Who Make Them
ルールを知る者創る者
